title: Wanted For Desire
description: When one journey ends, another begins.Working a dead-end job and newly single, Jules decides that she’s going to finally go after her dream of owning a cafe. She needs savings to get there and while searching for the perfect side job, she’s stumbled upon a very quick but illegal path.Through this new venture she meets three very different men she’d never dream she’d become entangled with. They all seem to offer her something she needs as she climbs her way to her goal; and, she finds herself unwilling to part with any of them. They are beautiful, alluring, enticing…and all have their own little illegal secrets. Together they flirt with fate and cross lines that will forever change their lives…for better or worse.Cliffy ending…until book 2!18+
author: Heather C. Adams
